description: Besides births and deaths, immigration and emigration are key drivers of demographic changes, especially for a strategically-located country like Malaysia. Using granular data from the Department of Immigration, this dashboard gives you insight into activity at our nation's borders. How many people enter Malaysia every year? Which country do they come from? Are there peak seasons for travelling? Dive in and find out!

section_1.title: How many people from {{ country }} are entering and leaving the country?
section_1.title_ALL: How many people from {{ country }} are entering and leaving the country overall?
section_1.description: This data is only available at national level because movement between states is free and unmonitored in Malaysia.

section_2.title: A breakdown of foreign arrivals by demographic group
section_2.description: This data helps illustrate various seasonal patterns. For example, male travellers enter at roughly the same rate all year. Conversely, there is a spike in child and teenage entrances during holiday seasons.
